title: HID - Sr. Data Orchestration Infra Engineer
summary: We’re looking for a high-energy, highly motivated Senior Engineer that will be a key member of the team responsible for designing and developing data orchestration tooling for HID algorithms development projects.
description: The HID core infrastructure team develops frameworks that support clients on embedded devices and creates tools that analyze the algorithm pipelines offline in local or clustered computers. These algorithms form the basis for next-generation touch and human interaction pipelines.
key_qualifications: Experience building and scaling systems both in networked local systems and the cloud. Experience building and architecting large scale applications/services.
education_experience: You've earned a: (a) MS in CS with 2+ years of experience in working with large data projects with at least 1 year building software/ml platforms, or (b) BS in CS with 5+ years of experience in the industry with at least 2 year building software/ml platforms
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200...
